title: Lead Graphic Artist in Ecommerce
job_overview:
We’re looking for a Creative Designer who’s not just good with visuals—but knows how to build a brand. If you have solid experience in shaping brand identity, designing digital ads that convert, and creating content that performs on social as well as ecommerce platforms, keep reading. This role is remote but follows EST hours. 

About Us
At Next Micro, we create impactful brands through sharp design, smart marketing, and strategic innovation. We sell across Shopify, Amazon, and other platforms, and we’re growing fast.

What You’ll Be Doing
Design Amazon A+ content, ads, and social media visuals that make people stop scrolling
Build polished Shopify and Amazon storefronts that align with brand strategy
Develop packaging designs that stand out online and on shelves
Collaborate closely with the marketing team to bring ideas to life across campaigns
Keep our brand identities cohesive, strategic, and visually on point

What You Need to Have
Proven experience designing for brands, not just templates
Strong portfolio showcasing digital ads, social content, e-commerce design, and packaging
Fluent in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)
Strong grasp of Shopify, Amazon, and social media formats
A deep understanding of brand identity and consumer behavior
Ability to manage your time, meet deadlines, and execute cleanly in a fast-paced team

What You’ll Get
Ownership of the creative vision for multiple brands
A collaborative team that actually values design
Clear growth opportunities as we scale

Important:

Work Hours: Must be available during EST business hours
Portfolio Required to apply
Assessment Test will be given to qualified candidates (we won't use your designs or put you through multiple rounds)

If you're an experienced designer who can take a brand from generic to unforgettable—we want to see your work. Apply now.
